content: Great app.

Just Plain Awesome!!! Does exactly and everything I want from an app like this! Wish I'd have found it sooner. The one I was using can't touch this one! I searched a lot too, but didn't see this. Then one day I ran across it looking for something else. I bought it that day (Worth It!)! I Bookmarked the Play entry and Extracted the Apk, just in case I have to Wipe my phone and set it up again and this app isn't in the Play Store for some reason. Think maybe I like this app a little? :-)
A nice big sigh of relief(now that I figured out how to adjust the little things that were for me a little annoying) . A great app that's a big stress releaver. Thank you. 😊
I like the app but the balance doesn't refresh after I make changes to a bill.

This app was exactly what I was looking for and certainly has been helpful for me in keeping track of my home and business billings and am using the paid version to show my thanks in the time it must have taken to develop such a good app.
Duplicate of the same transactions showing up. Please fix. Other than that, great app!
Really easy to use. The apps keep me on track with bills. I love it.
Good for up to date bills, it really helps keep track on when your bills is due. Recommend this 💯%

I thought about giving it four stars but end up giving it five. It's a great app and does what it says. The only thing I wish it did different is remember the screen it was last on when it's closed. It defaults to Overview when opening. I wish I had the option to make it open to Monthly View, which is my preference. Maybe this will become an option with an update. Over all a great app.
replyContent:
Hello John and thank you for your review,

You can already set a default view by going to the App settings and press 'Default view'.

Regards,
The AA3 Apps Team

content: Have been using for a few months and this app is almost perfect. I also use as a simple event diary. This app is what you hope for when you look for value and functionality. Please only make small changes because I really depend in this app. I use every day across most of my devices. THANK YOU. Here is the six star I very rarely give. *
Thanks for the reply. I use this program every day. its the best one out there.
replyContent:
Hello Chuck, We're working on a new update that includes a fix for data backup/restore on some devices/Android versions. It will be released soon.

-- Update 5-12-2020
We just published a new update, it will be available on the Play store soon. Please try it and let us know.

content: Be ckup saved me
Great! Easy to use
Notifications are not working for reminders

Best bill app i have found for my needs. would love to have the option of a "days due" in the overview page (and others), so instead of just the due date it shows exactly how many days before due. i find that my mind works better with this than dates.

great app, but wish it had a simply computer version that would link to the app. use this for my budgeting and it tracks, reminds, has the bill view or the calendar view so that you can plan out what to pay when.

New User Just getting started settling the bills. One improvement that will help is s reoccurring bill that can be set on a day of week, like the 3rd Wednesday of every month. You can only set to a numbered date now. Would also be helpful to have an option to back up to my SD Card As I know more I will adjust my rating..

absolutely awesome app and it does exactly what i was looking for. SUGGESTED: it would be really nice to have is a pending status. i know there is paid but pending would be nice as i pay my bill then it goes into a pending in bank or if a credit card payment is made it takes a day or two to show in bank. i have to keep track of that separately to make sure i keep track of what i have a payment setup for and don't
replyContent:
Thank you Nathan for your review.
We add your suggestion to our requested features list to be evaluated and prioritized.

Regards,
The AA3 Apps Team

content: Another useless app to me now. I do not use Google drive at all. I have always use dropbox and local storage for my back ups. I use this app daily and loved it until now. Please give use back the Dropbox and local storage or REFUND MY MONEY
replyContent:
Hello Richard,

We replied to your email.
We heard you and all our users asking for the local backup feature and we are already working to bring it back. It will be available in the next coming update.

Update: We just published a new update where we brought back the backup to local folder feature.

content: Wanted to upgrade to premium, couldn't get restore to work. Basic lets you backup to Google Drive, premium won't let you restore from there. Restore from local folder and Dropbox pop up an empty dialog.
replyContent:
Hello Ray,
We're working to upgrade the premium version to the same level as the basic one. A new update will be available in a couple of days.

Update: We published a new update with all new features (Google Drive, attachments, ...).

The AA3 Apps Team

content: DON'T purchase. I bought this in order to back up my data. Requires Dropbox. Okay. I bought Dropbox. I was changing cellphones and needed the backup. Backed up to Dropbox. it WOULD NOT RESTORE. Lost all of my information. still rebuilding.
In general, the design is good. The widget needs an improvement though. I hope it is more customizable, like show how many upcoming bills or which bills. Showing amount is just too much for me.

This product does a great job of keeping track of my finances, but one thing which kept me from giving it a 5* was security. Wish it incorporated the finger scan method instead of having enter the pin everytime. Hopefully that is in the works for future releases. Keep up the great work.

Very clean app works great! fast response to questions or possible add-ons. love that its a one time purchase for premium version. Unlike Mobill which is a great app but hate the fact that you have to continuously pay for it.
fanstastic
App seems to work well, haven't had any problems at all. It is easy to set up, and use as well.
Excellent app!
Great app to remind you of upcoming bills. Helps you plan your budget to cover expenses. Highly recommended.

In the overview section, some of my recurring bill are over 2 years period. However, I can only view 1 year ahead. And the recurring bills after 1 year do not show in the overview, thus it does not add in the balance as well. If you can fix it so I can view all my recurring bills would be great. Update: I found out in the setting that it only allow us to create recurring bill at most is 12 months in advance. Please update the application which allow us to create recurring bill without such limitation. Thank you Update : recently, the app always crash when I open the Paid tap. Please fix this issue because I really need the function to reconciliation with my payment. 17-Nov-2018 update The issue regarding error on the Paid tap has been solved. Thank you very much.
Back to 5 stars. If I could, I would give 6 stars for the quick response from the developers. I had an issue and they pushed a curative update in less than 24 hours. I am impressed!
Love it simple but very effective.
Been using this app for the past week and so far it's worked well. Have tried others before and suffered catastrophically. They all crashed eventually. I hope this one is different. It looks great.
Best app for keeping track of bills.
So far so good
replyContent:
Thank you angel for your review.
Your request has been added to our list of requested features.

Thank you again,
AA3 Apps

content: Good app.

Love this! Totally helps keep this distracted momma on track and bills paid 
on time. :-)

Very easy to use, helps me keep my Bill's organized. Really love the fact 
that you can graph your payable vs receivables

Bought the paid version and it doesn't allow some reoccurring bills to show 
up after the date I entered it. Makes it unreliable which upsets me that I 
paid for it. I even deleted the bill and reentered it and it still didn't 
work.

Bought premium one but cannot restore from drop box or from local folder. 
If you can't fix this refund my money.
Great way to schedule bills. No issues.

Pros: Easy to use; Provides Notifications, Charts, and Graphs; Affordable. 
Cons: Doesn't link to company bill paying websites; Does not provide an 
option to note bills paid, but not credited to banking accounts

I bought the premium version before uninstalled it, then when I reinstalled 
the app I did not have the premium app anymore, said I had to buy it, 
called Google they gave me a refund. It's a good app design and features so 
I will give it another chance, I will update this review in approx. 3 
months.

It has worked perfectly for reminding me of where my money is going, and 
seeing how much I need in my account. Really like it!
Great app!

Does what it says it does. Great simple interface. Keeps me from missing a 
payment.

I was pretty happy with the free version, but needed to allow more 
recurring payments. Very happy with the paid version.
A great way to remember upcoming bills and keep up with your budget.
Does exactly what I need it for

Love this app as a reminder of when to pay my bills! I didn't want to use a bill pay app where I had to enter my personal login information for several accounts. This app is just way great I wanted, as it sends me notifications of what is due. I can also look at upcoming bills. I like the 'calendar' feature where you can see green or red dots on each calendar day that a bill is scheduled. Green for paid, red for not paid yet.
Easy to use. Happy about it.
Doesn't work all the time.
Awesome app, love the material design. I don't know where I'd be without these reminders keeping me on track! Thank you for the dark theme!!
Very good app, easy to use. Developer quick to answer questions. I like it!
Easy to use bill tracker

Does what it says but has issues with reoccurring bills.  I can't delete reoccurring bills, you delete it and tell it all bills in sequence but it always reappears the following month. I have a bunch of paid off bills that I can't delete.
It works great as a bill reminder
Does what it needs to do!!!

content: Good tracker for bills and that's all.

I really love this app...I only wish it had split payments...this addition would  make it awesome!!!!

This app keeps up with my bills and payments just great.  Just wish it would accommodate multiple accounts.

Love this app. I would love to see a font  adjustment, it's a little  too fine. Also having a partial payment option will make this  app excellent. I have tried many budget apps but I always come back this app.                            Thank you to the developers.
